episode.title: The Creaturest of Habits
episode.rawTitle: 355: ‘The Creaturest of Habits’, With Daniel Jalkut
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Daniel Jalkut returns to the show. Topics include a serious discussion about CSAM detection at major cloud storage providers and messaging services. Also, a deep dive regarding the new iOS-UI-style rewrite of System Settings on the still-in-beta MacOS 13 Ventura, and thoughts on SwiftUI in general.
episode.showNotes:
Daniel Jalkut returns to the show. Topics include a serious discussion about CSAM detection at major cloud storage providers and messaging services. Also, a deep dive regarding the new iOS-UI-style rewrite of System Settings on the still-in-beta MacOS 13 Ventura, and thoughts on SwiftUI in general.

Sponsored by:

  • Linode: Instantly deploy and manage an SSD server in the Linode Cloud. New accounts get a $100 credit.
  • Memberful: Monetize your passion with membership. Start your free trial today.
  • RevenueCat: In-app subscriptions made easy.

Links:

  • Kashmir Hill's report for the NYT: "A Dad Took Photos of His Naked Toddler for the Doctor. Google Flagged Him as a Criminal."
    • My take on the implications of that story.
  • System Settings in MacOS 13 Ventura:
    • Me, at DF: "The Fit and Finish of the All-New System Settings on MacOS 13 Ventura".
    • Jalkut, at his Bitsplitting blog: "Disciplined Innovation".
  • MarsEdit 5 will support Markdown syntax coloring. Finally.
  • Red Sweater Software.
  • Core Intuition, the podcast Jalkut cohosts with Manton Reece.

This episode of The Talk Show was edited by Caleb Sexton.
